channel.title: Upgrading your players rights
channel.description: My server is zylafscape.no-ip.biz and im using allstar v2.0. to make your player a owner all you need to do is open up characters then click on your one. then find player rights. (make sure u r logged out while u r doing this) and then change it to 1 - for mod 2- admin 3 - owner. then save it (dont save as) then log back in. then speak and you should have you status. this was from zylafscape.no-ip.biz

item.title: Upgrading your players rights
item.dc:creator: @zylaf zylaf
item.description:
@zylaf wrote:

My server is zylafscape.no-ip.biz and im using allstar v2.0. to make your player a owner all you need to do is open up characters then click on your one. then find player rights. (make sure u r logged out while u r doing this) and then change it to 1 - for mod 2- admin 3 - owner. then save it (dont save as) then log back in. then speak and you should have you status. this was from zylafscape.no-ip.biz
